usage.cn: 有时候，真希望自己可以适时的穿越回去，去见见那个还是个小孩子的自己
usage.eng: Sometimes, I wish I can walk through timely, and meet the back was still a child.

usage.cn: 一个父亲能为他孩子做的最好事情，就是好好爱他的妈妈。 -Theodore M. Hesburgh
usage.eng: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.

usage.cn: 恋爱往往使一个大人变回小孩子；每一次的分手，却逼着我们学习做一个大人...
usage.eng: Love often make an adult change back into children , Every time of break up, but made us to learn to do an adult.

usage.cn: 抚养孩子并不是改正他们的缺点，找出他们的错误，而是去识别和发展他们的长处。——《A Primer in Positive Psychology》.
usage.eng: Raising Children is not about correcting their weaknesses and fixing whatever is wrong with them. Rather, it is about identifying and nurturing their strengths.
